entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
